page.title: 12Cathedral and Old Ruins.
page.content: The new cathedral towers above the old ruins. Epstein's statue of St. Michael and Satan hangs outside. Engraved glass doors lead into the cathedral which has an airy atmosphere. To the right are beautiful coloured glass windows. There is a sacred boulder of rock, imported from Bethlehem. A corridor leads to a circular room with a great model of the Crown of Thorns which hangs around a giant cross. Small stools are around it. There is an ernormous tapestry by Sutherland , much bigger than you can imagine, at the East End. The ceiling is so high you have to bend your neck right back to see the top. There are holograms which look as though the picture is coming out towards you. The ruins are the walls, tower and spire of the old cathedral.
